column4: I have precise running and for some reason when i do apt-get install nginx or nginx-full it says the package doesn't exist… it worked on 32bit but not 64bit for me… ideas?
E: Unable to locate package nginx-full
they may not have a port or a maintainer for the 64-bit version. I'm not sure. Try "apt-cache search ngin" and see if it finds anything
looking at http://packages.ubuntu.com/precise/nginx-full it has an amd64 version?
